title: Johnny and the Bomb
description: Mrs Tachyon is just a nutty old bag lady, isn't she? No. Somehow, with her bunch of dubious black bags, she holds the key to different times, different eras - including the Blitz in 1941. Suddenly now isn't the safe place Johnny thought it was as he finds himself bound up more and more with then...Another highly entertainig tale from the master of comic fantasy, Terry Pratchett, author of the bestselling Bromeliad trilogy and the hugely successful DiscworldÂ® series.
author: Terry Pratchett
